chapters.title: Chapter 15: Stronger than Written Law
chapters.info: Halima Saranov, p. 309 (345)—Egwene's evening maid. She is actually Delana's maid, but she lends her to Egwene at night to help with her chronic headaches. Since she is actually Aran'gar, a reincarnated Forsaken who channels saidin despite being female, it is likely that she is causing Egwene's headaches, and then making them subside in order to keep her close to Egwene. See also Aran'gar.
